posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil
The snow is coming down outside and I need something to keep me busy for the long weekend......so I am looking to buy some SGC Graded T206s.  I only collect ones graded SGC50 or higher.

The "pickings" on eBay lately have been few and far between.  If you have a list of T206s that are SGC50 or better, please email me with a price for each.  I will promptly get back to you.

HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Phil

Posted By: Christopher
I have several SGC 50 T206s on my website (also a bunch of PSA 4s).  Pics and prices included.  Free shipping and PayPal OK.  Click the banner...
